history.proof: induction A as [|h t IH]. - right. intros x H. inversion H. - destruct (p_dec h) as [Hph|Hnph]. + left. exists h. split. * left. reflexivity. * auto. + destruct IH as [H|H]. * left. destruct H as [x [H1 H2]]. exists x. split. -- right. apply H1. -- apply H2. * right. intros x [H1|H1]. -- rewrite H1 in Hnph. apply Hnph. -- apply H. apply H1.

original: induction A as [|h t IH]. - right. intros x H. inversion H. - destruct (p_dec h) as [Hph|Hnph]. + left. exists h. split. * left. reflexivity. * auto. + destruct IH as [H|H]. * left. destruct H as [x [H1 H2]]. exists x. split. -- right. apply H1. -- apply H2. * right. intros x [H1|H1]. -- rewrite H1 in Hnph. apply Hnph. -- apply H. apply H1.
